body.p:
Louisville Ky Feb. 13th 1865.
Honorable Thomas E Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky.
Sir

I have been in Gen. Roussaus Brigade some two years and I thought I would send a few lines to you and ask you for a Commission as a Capt or a Leutanant in the State Service if I had a Commission I think in a very short time I could have a Company ready for service

Yours with honor
Respectfully
F B Russell

State forces
Louisville Ky
Feby. 13" 1865
Russell F. B.
To the Gov --
Desires authority to raise a Co. for state service --

Hd. Qrs. C. G. Regt.
Frankfort, Feby 17th/65
Respectfully forwarded with the reccomendation that recruiting authority be granted.

A. J. Harrington
Maj Comdg C. G. Regt.

Issue
D, W, Lindsey
I & A. G. Ky

issued Feby 17th 65
Recd A. G. O. Ky 14 Feby 1865
